titleStmt.title: The evening star appearing to the saints, directing them to celebrate their holy rest, even the Sabbath-day (not from morning to morning nor from midnight to midnight but) from even to even, according to the word of God ... There is an epistle to the Parliament in the conclusion ... Unto which is annexed, A new Christian creed ... / By Samuel Chidley, Cler.
titleStmt.author: Chidley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: pagination goes from p. 24 to p. 49.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
